About The McGennis Family in Jefferson City, Missouri

The McGennis family, led by Caleb Michael McGennis (also known online as dr4g0nbyt3) and Stephanie Kay McGennis, is making waves in Jefferson City, Missouri through entrepreneurship and community service. With two sons, Leonardo Bryton McGennis and Raphael Corwyn McGennis, the family is building a legacy in Central Missouri.

Caleb McGennis owns multiple businesses including BXP, The Honey Homestead, What's the Process for, Toxic Tournaments, Nostalgia Nuke, and LoHP. He is also an active member of Sports Crusaders ministry and has extensive experience with the Missouri Baptist Convention and Concord Baptist Church.

Keywords: McGennis family Jefferson City, Caleb McGennis entrepreneur, dr4g0nbyt3, Jefferson City Missouri families, BXP Jefferson City, The Honey Homestead, Sports Crusaders Missouri, Jefferson City business owners, Missouri Baptist Convention, notable families Jefferson City MO
